item.title: 3 key benefits of live video chat
item.description: Bots can solve a proportion of customersâ€™ needs. However, even if a bot has been trained to understand complicated statements and is able to answer in an intelligent and sophisticated manner, there are cases when customers need to speak with a live agent. Bots should not alienate nor irritate your customers. This is the point when WebRTC technology plays its role. A large number of different businesses could benefit from offering live video chat services.
